# 【spark论文】大型集群上的快速和通用数据处理架构（修正版）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban
spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban
spark-lunwen-daxing-jiqun-shang-de-kuaisu-he-tongyong-shujuchuli-jiagou-xiuzhengban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
